item.title: Launching LLEMR at UMKC
item.description: If you are a member of a student-run free clinic or similar group looking to launch an electronic medical record (EMR) to your clinic, you’re in the right place. My name is Eshwar and I am a student at the University of Missouri-Kansas City (UMKC) School of Medicine who …
item.dc:creator: Eshwar Kishore
